system.description: You conjure a phantom watchdog that is invisible to everyone except yourself. It guards the area where you cast the spell. The hound immediately starts barking if any Small or larger creature approaches within 30 feet of it. Those within 30 feet of the hound when it begins barking must succeed on a Will save or be paralyzed for 1 round. The hound sees invisible and ethereal creatures. It does not react to illusions, and it cannot be harmed. The hound cannot attack. It lasts 1 hour per caster level or until discharged. The hound can be discharged by you as a standard action. The spell cannot be cast on more than one location at a time; casting it again ends the previous spell.

components.materialDescription: A tiny silver whistle, a piece of bone, and a thread. Focus: a small piece of meat.
